mapper.select: WITH APPLYVIEW AS ( SELECT DISTINCT A.APL_NO, A.RCRT_NO, COMPANY_ID, USERS_ID, A.RESATT_NO, RESUME_TITLE , C.RPROC_ORDER, APROC_PASS, RPROC_END FROM APPLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN RESUME_ATTATCH B ON (A.RESATT_NO = B.RESATT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN A_PROCEDURE C ON (A.APL_NO = C.APL_NO AND A.RCRT_NO = C.RCRT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN R_PROCEDURE D ON (A.RCRT_NO = D.RCRT_NO AND C.RPROC_ORDER = D.RPROC_ORDER) LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUIT E ON (A.RCRT_NO = E.RCRT_NO) ) SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM RESUME A RIGHT OUTER JOIN APPLYVIEW B ON A.USERS_ID = B.USERS_ID AND A.RESUME_TITLE = B.RESUME_TITLE WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{variousCondition.companyId} AND B.APROC_PASS = 'Y' AND B.RPROC_END = 'Y' AND A.RESUME_OPEN_STATUS='Y' AND B.RPROC_ORDER = ( SELECT MAX(RPROC_ORDER) FROM A_PROCEDURE)

WITH APPLYVIEW AS ( SELECT DISTINCT A.APL_NO, A.RCRT_NO, COMPANY_ID, USERS_ID, A.RESATT_NO, RESUME_TITLE , C.RPROC_ORDER, APROC_PASS, RPROC_END FROM APPLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN RESUME_ATTATCH B ON (A.RESATT_NO = B.RESATT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN A_PROCEDURE C ON (A.APL_NO = C.APL_NO AND A.RCRT_NO = C.RCRT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN R_PROCEDURE D ON (A.RCRT_NO = D.RCRT_NO AND C.RPROC_ORDER = D.RPROC_ORDER) LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUIT E ON (A.RCRT_NO = E.RCRT_NO) ) SELECT DISTINCT B.APL_NO , COMPANY_ID , RCRT_NO , B.RPROC_ORDER , B.APROC_PASS , B.RPROC_END , A.USERS_ID ,B.RESATT_NO , A.RESUME_NO , A.RESUME_TITLE , TO_CHAR(A.RESUME_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "resumeDate" , A.RESUME_OPEN_STATUS FROM RESUME A RIGHT OUTER JOIN APPLYVIEW B ON A.USERS_ID = B.USERS_ID AND A.RESUME_TITLE = B.RESUME_TITLE WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{variousCondition.companyId} AND B.APROC_PASS = 'Y' AND B.RPROC_END = 'Y' AND A.RESUME_OPEN_STATUS='Y' AND B.RPROC_ORDER = ( SELECT MAX(RPROC_ORDER) FROM A_PROCEDURE)

SELECT A.RESUME_NO , A.USERS_ID , A.RESUME_TITLE , REPLACE(A.RESUME_PORTFOLIO,',','') RESUME_PORTFOLIO , A.RESUME_OPEN_STATUS , A.RESUME_DATE , B.USERS_NM , TO_CHAR(USERS_BIR, 'YYYY') USERS_BIR , B.USERS_GEN , B.USERS_IMG , C.MEM_TEL , C.MEM_MAIL , C.MEM_ZIP , C.MEM_ADDR1 FROM RESUME A LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS B ON(A.USERS_ID=B.USERS_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER C ON(A.USERS_ID=C.MEM_ID) WHERE A.RESUME_NO = #{resumeNo}

SELECT EDU_NO , RESUME_NO , EDU_SCHOOLNM , EDU_MAJORNM , TO_CHAR(EDU_STDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') EDU_STDATE , TO_CHAR(EDU_ENDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') EDU_ENDATE , EDU_GRADE , EDU_STANDARD_GRADE , EDU_GRADUATE FROM EDUCATION WHERE RESUME_NO = #{resumeNo} ORDER BY EDU_ENDATE DESC
SELECT CER_NO , RESUME_NO , CER_NM , TO_CHAR(CER_DATE_ACQST, 'YYYYMMDD') CER_DATE_ACQST FROM CERTIFICATE WHERE RESUME_NO = #{resumeNo} ORDER BY CER_DATE_ACQST DESC
SELECT PS_NO , RESUME_NO , PS_TITLE , PS_CONTENT FROM PERSONAL_STATEMENT WHERE RESUME_NO = #{resumeNo}

SELECT LAG_NO , RESUME_NO , LAG_NAME , LAG_TESTNM , TO_CHAR(LAG_DATE_ACQST, 'YYYYMMDD') LAG_DATE_ACQST , LAG_CONTENT , LAG_LEVEL FROM LANGUAGE WHERE RESUME_NO = #{resumeNo} ORDER BY LAG_DATE_ACQST DESC

SELECT IA_NO , RESUME_NO , IA_NAME , TO_CHAR(IA_STDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') IA_STDATE , TO_CHAR(IA_ENDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') IA_ENDATE , IA_CONTENT FROM INTRN_ACTVT WHERE RESUME_NO = #{resumeNo} ORDER BY IA_ENDATE DESC

SELECT OS_NO , RESUME_NO , OS_COUNTRYNM , TO_CHAR(OS_STDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') OS_STDATE , TO_CHAR(OS_ENDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') OS_ENDATE , OS_CONTENT FROM OVERSEAS_STUDY WHERE RESUME_NO = #{resumeNo} ORDER BY OS_ENDATE DESC

SELECT CR_NO , RESUME_NO , CR_COMPANYNM , TO_CHAR(CR_STDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') CR_STDATE , TO_CHAR(CR_ENDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') CR_ENDATE , CR_CONTENT FROM CAREER WHERE RESUME_NO = #{resumeNo} ORDER BY CR_ENDATE DESC

SELECT P.point_pmtno, P.users_id, P.ticket_no, P.pmt_methdno, P.point_pdate, P.point_hold, P.point_charge, P.point_use, P.point_remain, P.point_record, T.ticket_name, T.ticket_period, (P.point_pdate + T.ticket_period-1) AS ticketExpired FROM pointpay P JOIN ticketmnmt T ON P.ticket_no = T.ticket_no WHERE P.users_id = #{usersId} AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) >= TRUNC(point_pdate) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) <= TRUNC(P.point_pdate + T.ticket_period-1)
SELECT mem_division FROM member WHERE mem_id=#{usersId}
